string.value: After making a job advancement as a Magician, you need to find a training center that'll help you level up faster.
After making a job advancement as a Magician, you should follow the arrows from Ellinia that lead you to a training center. You won't be able to enter once you reach Level 20.
You found the training center for beginning Magicians. You'll be able to receive your first set of training lessons from the trainer, Power B. Fore.

Congratulations on making the job advancement as a magician. I can see you're exuding the quiet confidence of a powerful magician, and yet...you seem to lack something. I suggest you train a bit more at the Training Center, where you can become even more formidable. I'll teach you how to get to the Training Center. Are you interested?

That's great! Go outside, and you'll see a series of arrows pointing in a certain direction. Follow them and you'll see the entrance to the Training Center, where you can train to become even more powerful!
I suggest you go there before you reach Level 20, because you won't be allowed inside afterwards.
Ah, really? Well, the Training Center can be found nearby, so maybe you can find it on your own. Best of luck to you!
Welcome, welcome. #bGrendel the Really Old#k has already contacted me about this. So you're a beginner magician? Train with me for a bit, and you'll be able to improve in a jiffy.

Before we start, let me show you this letter of commendation I received for being an exemplary adventurer. I don't like to brag, but I used to be quite the adventurer, you know! Hold on one second, while I find that letterâ€¦
Here, you can rapidly move up the ranks and become an intermediate-level magician.
